rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a foyer and storage closet. The design considers Vastu principles by aligning the entrance facing east.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with Mediterranean style decor featuring warm colors, textured flooring and large windows on the south side for ample sunlight. Adheres to Vastu by ensuring balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Separate dining area adjoining the living room with a view of the garden, maintaining harmony as per Vastu and Mediterranean aesthetics.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen designed with modern amenities and Mediterranean style tiles. Placed in the northeast corner for positive energy according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private master bedroom featuring a balcony overlooking the city view. Oriented towards the southwest for restful sleep as suggested by Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: Guest or family bedroom with Mediterranean accents. Placed in the northwest to promote balanced energy distribution.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-lit bathroom adjoining the master bedroom and second bedroom for convenience and privacy.

openings.location: Between living room and dining area
